<h1>Register for Account Online</h1><p>Create your online profile for a convenient way to manage your FortisBC <span class=\"oneWord\">account(s)</span>. With Account Online you can:</p><ul><li>start, stop or move your service</li><li>view your current bill and account information</li><li>manage your bill and payment options</li><li>update your contact information</li></ul><p>To register, you will need a piece of identification such as your driver's licence and information from your most recent bill.</p><input id=\"accountSetup:login_regnacct_btn\" type=\"submit\" name=\"accountSetup:login_regnacct_btn\" value=\"Register\" tabindex=\"11\" title=\"Register\" class=\"btn btn-default\">\n              <button tabindex=\"12\" type=\"button\" class=\"btn btn-link\" data-content=\"Lets existing FortisBC customers manage their service account(s) online.\" data-container=\"body\" data-toggle=\"popover\" data-placement=\"top\" data-html=\"true\" data-original-title=\"\" title=\"\"><i class=\"icon-info text-blue-light\"></i></button>\n            </div>\n          </div>\n          \n          <div class=\"panel panel-default\">\n            <div class=\"panel-body\"><b>New customer</b>? Account Online is for FortisBC customers. If you'd like to arrange service, please <a tabindex=\"13\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"requestservice/requestserv.xhtml\">complete our online form</a>. <span><i class=\"glyphicon blueFont glyphicon-new-window\"></i></span>\n           </div>\n          </div><input type=\"hidden\" name=\"javax.faces.ViewState\" id=\"javax.faces.ViewState\" value=\"\">\n</form>\n      </div>\n    </div>\n    <hr>\n    <div class=\"panel panel-help\">\n      <div class=\"panel-heading\">\n        <h4 class=\"panel-title\"> <a data-toggle=\"collapse\" href=\"#needHelp\" class=\"collapsed\"> <i class=\"icon-help text-blue-light\"></i>&nbsp; Need help with this page?</a> </h4>\n      </div>\n      <div id=\"needHelp\" class=\"panel-collapse collapse\">\n        <div class=\"panel-body\"><p><strong>I don’t know my user  ID and/or password.</strong><br>Online profiles are available to all existing FortisBC  customers, but are not set up automatically with your account. If you have not  set up an online profile, visit the <a href=\"pages/usrmgmt/regn1.xhtml\">Register</a> page and follow the instructions.</p><p>If you have previously registered for an online profile, but  forgotten your user ID/password, you can use an automated service that will  allow you to recover/reset the lost information. To do so, visit <a href=\"pages/login/forgotLoginId/recoverLoginId.xhtml\">Forgot your  user ID?</a><em> </em>or <a href=\"pages/login/forgotPassword/recoverPassword.xhtml\">Forgot your password?</a>, then follow the instructions.</p><hr><p><strong>I’m not a FortisBC  customer. Is signing up for Account Online the same as starting a new  account with FortisBC?</strong><br>No. Online profiles are only available for customers who  have already signed up for service from FortisBC.</p><p>Sign up for service</p><p>Natural gas: sign up your home or business by calling <strong>1-888-224-2710</strong>. <br>  Electricity: sign up your home or business by calling <strong>1-866-436-7847</strong> or  sign up online.</p><hr><p><strong>Is there an extra  cost to sign up for an online profile?<br></strong>No. Signing up for an online profile is free to all of our customers.</p><hr><p><strong>What is a user ID?  Why is it different than my account number?</strong><br>  Your user ID is a unique identifier used for your online  profile. Your user ID is determined when you first sign up for an online  profile and can be changed through your profile settings.</p><p>By entering a user ID rather than relying solely on account  numbers, our customers are able to link more than one account to their online profile.</p><hr><p><strong>Is my personal  information secure?<br></strong>Our website uses the most reliable hardware and software available to  ensure your personal information remains secure.<strong> </strong>For more information on how your personal information is used by  FortisBC, please see Section 4 of our <a href=\"http://fortisbc.com/Pages/privacypolicy.aspx\" target=\"_blank\">Privacy Policy <span class=\"glyphicon blueFont glyphicon-new-window\"></span></a>. <strong></strong></p><hr><p><strong>Is there a FortisBC  mobile app?<br></strong>You can access your FortisBC online profile directly through your mobile  device’s web browser. The site automatically adjusts to deliver an optimized  experience on all devices.</p><p>Most mobile devices allow you to save a website bookmark to  the home screen for quick access to your online profile.<strong></strong></p><hr><p><strong>Where can I find my  FortisBC account number?<br></strong>Your FortisBC account number can be found near the top of the first page of  your bill, and on the FortisBC remittance form located at the bottom of your  FortisBC paper bill.</p><hr><p><strong>I’m having difficulty  logging in/creating a new online profile. Who do I contact?</strong><br>  Please contact customer service: <a href=\"http://fortisbc.com/ContactUs/NaturalGasContacts/Pages/default.aspx\" target=\"_blank\">natural gas <span class=\"glyphicon blueFont glyphicon-new-window\"></span></a> / <a href=\"http://fortisbc.com/ContactUs/ElectricityContacts/Pages/default.aspx\" target=\"_blank\">electricity <span class=\"glyphicon blueFont glyphicon-new-window\"></span></a>.</p>\n        </div>\n      </div>\n    </div>\n    <hr>\n    <div class=\"row\">\n\t    \t<div class=\"col-sm-5 col-sm-padding-top\"> <a
